A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a star wars fan since I was a little kid. I used to watch the original trilogy on repeat on VHS. I then read over 30 of the star wars novels. I say all this to explain that despite my love for the novels\, I love what they've been doing with these movies. I think they handled Luke Skywalker perfectly based on who he is in the original trilogy. I highly recommend this movie and suggest to watch it with an open mind.
